participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and thoughtful, she often seeks to understand the world around her.
participant_1.background: my bedroom is purple and lime green. i am a vegan. i like riding horses. i'll graduate from high school in two years. i have brown curly hair.

participant_2.name: David

participant_2.background: i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i'm an economics major. i'm married with two kids. i eat a raw diet.

content.text: i don't understand how this works
